name: eurhythmce
description:
eurhythmce is a rhythm/puzzle game based on Greek mythology. Play as Eurydice as you stay on beat while you make the right moves and follow Orpheus out of hell!

The controls are:

- Arrow keys to move.

- Spacebar to skip the intro/title screen.

Credits:

Hatim Benhsain (@hatimb00) - Art, Music, Game Design, Code.

Matthew Varona (@infairvar) - Level Design, Game Design, Code, Voice Recording.

(with extra help from Kiko Tallada as a V.A.)
